description: Features clip where Yorozuya discusses 8 years of Gintama, live dubbing performance by the series` seiyuu to clips from Gintama (2006) and Gintama`: Enchousen (2012), live band performances and more.

titles.title: Gintama the Movie: Silver Screen Eve Festival (2013)
劇場版 銀魂 銀幕前夜祭り 2013
